title: Deeply Touched President Wants Army to Get Affected Law Student a High Quality Prosthetic Arm
content: Sri Lanka Army on the directions of HE the President Mahinda Rajapaksa has offered a prosthetic arm to Ms Achala Priyadarshani, the final year Law student, whose arm on alleged medical negligence, was amputated after an accidental fall from a flight of stairs at her home in Urubokka….
